fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, Enlargement, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Communication
eu_initiatives: Protection of human rights and freedoms, the right to freedom of conscience and religion, inter-religious dialogue, peacekeeping, charitable social activities.
organisation_name: Representation of the Ukrainian Orthodox Church Kyiv Patriarchate to the European Institutions (UOC KP)
section: V - Organisations representing churches and religious communities
subsection: Organisations representing churches and religious communities
membership:
Ukrainian Orthodox Church Kyiv Patriarchate have member communities in: Ukraine, United Kingdom, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Australia, USA, Russian Federation. 
 
UOC KP is member of the Ukrainian Council of Churches and Religious Organizations  http://vrciro.org.ua/ua/
position: Representative of the UOC KP to the European Institutions
